description: Try our easy to follow Baby's Pureed Lamb Koftas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Baby food,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Rice,Lamb,Mince,Peanut free
name: Baby's Pureed Lamb Koftas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl mix together the mince, garlic, zucchini, breadcrumbs and parsley until fully combined. Roll into 8 oval shaped sausages.
Heat a little oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium low heat. Cook until golden and fully cooked through. Allow to cool for 5 minutes.
Place the koftas in a blender or food processor with the chickpeas, lime juice and 2/3 cup water. Process until smooth or until desired consistency for babyâ€™s developmental age.
